articles.author: The Tribune India
articles.title: Biden nominates Indian-American Ajay Banga for World Bank president - The Tribune India
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Thursday announced that the US is nominating Ajay Banga to lead the World Bank, saying the Indian-American business leader is uniquely equipped to lead the global institution at “this critical moment in history”.
articles.content:
PTI
Washington, February 23
President Joe Biden on Thursday announced that the US is nominating Ajay Banga to lead the World Bank, saying the Indian-American business leader is uniquely equipped to… [+3092 chars]

articles.author: Elana Gotkine
articles.title: Certain genetic variant in Alzheimer's disease linked to African ancestry - Medical Xpress
articles.description: For individuals of African ancestry, the APOE ε3 R145C missense variant is associated with an increased risk for Alzheimer disease (AD), according to a study published in the Feb. 21 issue of the Journal of the American Medical Association.
articles.content: For individuals of African ancestry, the APOE 3 R145C missense variant is associated with an increased risk for Alzheimer disease (AD), according to a study published in the Feb. 21 issue of the Jour… [+2244 chars]
